wikipedia_page.main: Colin Smyth (born November 1972) is a Scottish politician who has been a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the South Scotland region since 2016. A member of Scottish Labour, he served as its general secretary from 2008 to 2012.

response: *Colin Smyth - Shadow Cabinet Secretary for Economic Development and Rural Affairs
